articles.title: Oil prices drop on fuel demand worries as coronavirus flares up - EWN
articles.description: US West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude futures fell 22 cents, or 0.5% to $40.79 a barrel at 0132 GMT, while Brent crude futures fell 27 cents, or 0.6% to $43.88 a barrel.
